sys_openapi_operation.name: Delete board
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Delete board","fOperationId":"deleteBoard","fDescription":"Deletes the board. Admin without the view permission can still remove the board. ","fPath":"/agile/1.0/board/{boardId}","fHttpMethod":"DELETE","fDeprecated":true,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"204","fDescription":"Returned if the board has been successfully removed.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"Returned if the user does not a have valid license, or when the user does not have the permission to delete the board, or when the user tried to delete a next-gen board. The user has to be a Jira Administrator or a board administrator to remove the board. Next-gen boards cannot be deleted, because next-gen software projects must have a board.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned if a board with the given ID does not exist or the user does not have the permission to view the board.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"boardId","fDescription":"ID of the board to be deleted","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"boardId0686642953","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}}]}]}
